story_zako_battle_02_01/3801_0101_0300_1:
Sync pair alert! Sync pair alert!
If we take your strong Pokémon, 
we will get stronger, too!
story_zako_battle_02_01/3801_0101_0400_1: You there! Hand over your partner Pokémon!
story_zako_battle_02_01/3801_0501_0100_1:
Did we not prepare well enough?
Retreat!
story_zako_battle_02_01/3702_0101_0100_1:
I feel eyes on me...
Could it be?
story_zako_battle_02_01/3702_0101_0200_1:
You must be those meddling kids I keep
hearing about!
story_zako_battle_02_01/3702_0101_0300_1:
Whoa, hold the phone...
You got yourselves some mighty fine Pokémon
there, don’t ya.
story_zako_battle_02_01/3702_0101_0400_1:
I’ll take all of you out—and take your Pokémon
while I’m at it! Get ’em!
story_zako_battle_02_01/3702_0501_0100_1: Darn it! You’ll pay for this!
story_zako_battle_02_01/3802_0101_0500_1:
Hmm? Somebody’s in our hideout!
What was the lookout doing?
story_zako_battle_02_01/3802_0101_0600_1:
Well well, it looks like we have some fine
specimens here!
story_zako_battle_02_01/3802_0101_0700_1:
Thank you for raising your Pokémon
with so much love and care...
We’ll be taking them now!
story_zako_battle_02_01/3802_0501_0400_1:
Strategic retreat!
We’ll steal some stronger Pokémon 
and get you next time!
story_zako_battle_02_01/3703_0101_0200_1:
I got this ripped after I gave up being able
to float!
story_zako_battle_02_01/3703_0501_0100_1:
Not even my glorious muscles could help me
overcome this?!
story_zako_battle_02_01/3803_0101_0100_1:
Aw, jeez, this is the pits!
Our eyes just met!
story_zako_battle_02_01/3803_0101_0200_1: You wanna get past me? Be my guest.
story_zako_battle_02_01/3803_0101_0300_1:
Well, I’d like to say that, but I should at least
do my job, right? Hand over your Pokémon!
story_zako_battle_02_01/3803_0501_0100_1:
Well, I did my job as well as I could.
Nobody can say I didn’t try.
